1.title: Andrea Tackles Sports

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Andrea discovers Odin is becoming a jock and feels she must learn about sports, so she visits the wives of NFL players to immerse herself in the world of football.

2.title: Andrea and the Case of the Spy Moms

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Andrea visits detective mothers who spy on their children to seek advice.

3.title: Andrea Reels in Wisdom

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Andrea loves to fish, and holds a world record to prove it. Hoping her son will share her love of the sea, she casts her net for fisher moms for advice on how to get Odin hooked.

4.title: Andrea Escapes to the Big Top

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Andrea is overwhelmed with the mundane tasks of motherhood and gets the urge to escape, so she hits the road to the circus to explore family life under the big top.

5.title: Andrea Pulls an All-Nighter

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Andrea talks with mothers who work the night shift in order to learn how they function.

6.title: Andrea the Average Student

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Andrea visits with mothers of valedictorians and top-notch students.

7.title: Andrea Geeks Out

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Andrea seeks out scientists, comic book enthusiasts and live-action role players.

8.title: Andrea Gets Tough

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Andrea spends time with some biker mothers in hopes of toughening up.

9.title: Andrea Gets in Tune

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Andrea meets with some musician mothers in an attempt to connect with her music-loving son.

10.title: Andrea Discovers Land

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Andrea meets a group of mothers who raise their children to live off the land.

11.title: Andrea Risks It All

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Andrea meets with a stunt woman and a drag-racing mother to learn about courage.

12.title: Andrea Makes Some Memories

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Andrea take a trip down memory lane with her friends.

13.title: Andrea Learns to Be a Cali Mom

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Andrea moves from New York City to California and tries to fit in by learning to surf and hike.

14.title: Andrea Gets the Party Started

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Andrea needs to plan a party for her son's birthday, but she finds the task difficult, so she explores different cultural celebrations for inspiration.

15.title: Andrea Preps for Baby #2

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: As Baby 2 countdown begins, Andrea feels completely unprepared for what a house full of boys may bring, so she frantically seeks out fraternity brothers, a financial planner, and a sibling class to ready herself for life with two kids.

16.title: Andrea Gives Birth

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Baby Rosen is breech. Andrea is bewildered on how to prep for the birth, so she bears down by visiting birthing experts.

1.title: Andrea Visits a Nudist Resort

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: It's that one question every mother has: How nude should I be in front of my child? Andrea goes to visit the Sunny Rest nudist resort and learns the naked truth.

2.title: Andrea Searches for Spirituality

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Andrea wants her kid to have a spiritual life, so she spends time with the Lubavitch mothers of Crown Heights and learns how they make space for the soul.

3.title: Andrea Shifts Fears

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Andrea shifts it into drive as she journeys with Manhattan moms in a New York City taxi. Are a mother's fears ever at rest?

4.title: Andrea Tries to Chill Out

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Andrea escapes to Woodstock to find balance in her chaotic life. She tries to find peace so that she doesn't transmit her neurosis to her son.

5.title: Andrea Gets Physical

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Andrea needs to shake herself out of her 24/7 baby brain, so she goes to meet some daring Roller Derby moms and sexy Burlesque performers -- mothers who are serious about their "me time."

6.title: Andrea Meets the Efficient Moms

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Andrea just has one toddler and she can barely manage to get dressed and make lunch, so she meets up with some super-efficient mothers [WITH BIG FAMILIES] to find out how they manage their time without losing their minds.

7.title: Andrea Wonders, Is Bigger Better?

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Craving the large extended family she never had, Andrea visits the friendly, chaotic Molina clan and discovers the joys and pitfalls of big family life.

8.title: Andrea Takes Charge

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Andrea has trouble saying "no" to her 1 year old, so it's off to meet some West Indian mothers who teach her how to take charge.

9.title: Andrea Wants a Mama's Boy

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Never wanting her son to ever leave her, Andrea visits a group of Bronx Italian moms - and their devoted adult sons - for lessons on bonding.

10.title: Andrea Gets Schooled

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Afraid her son Odin will grow up to be unintelligent, Andrea visits Sumita Chakravarty and her mom friends of Edison, New Jersey to learn about the importance of education.

11.title: Andrea Doesn't Want to Raise a Jerk

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: A run-in with an obnoxious stranger convinces Andrea she must teach her son respect. So she meets some moms and masters from Japan who consider respect an art form.

12.title: Andrea Gets Some Grace

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Wanting to parent with grace and ease, Andrea finds a group of chic moms to show her the art of relaxed parenting, French-style.

13.title: Andrea Takes Off

episode of.title: Take Me to Your Mother (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: One small step for Andrea, one giant step for Momkind. Andrea panics as she leaves Odin for the first time, so who better to seek advice from than the world's most ambitious commuters, NASA Moms.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: Comic Andrea Rosen is a first-time mom who has a lot to learn about kids. She decides that the best way to learn how to raise a child is by asking for other mothers' advice. She travels across the country, taking to the streets and posing questions to women of different cultures and backgrounds about raising a responsible, caring child. Each episode focuses on a specific topic that helps her with one aspect of parenthood. To paraphrase Rosen, her ultimate goal is not to raise a jerk.
imdb.title: Take Me to Your Mother
akas: Take Me to Your Mother (United States)
plot: A new mother embarks upon a journey to meet moms from different cultures and life experiences to seek advice on how to raise a good kid.::Hot Air

Comic Andrea Rosen is a first-time mom who has a lot to learn about kids. She decides that the best way to learn how to raise a child is by asking for other mothers' advice. She travels across the country, taking to the streets and posing questions to women of different cultures and backgrounds about raising a responsible, caring child. Each episode focuses on a specific topic that helps her with one aspect of parenthood. To paraphrase Rosen, her ultimate goal is not to raise a jerk.::Anonymous
synopsis: New mother Andrea Rosen embarks upon a comedic journey to meet moms from different cultures and life experiences seeking advice on how to raise a good kid.
